A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was such a let down. How can they give such a big project to a director who made only 4 movie in his whole career and his last movie being Looper. Are you freaking serious\, Disney? Someone or how many were involved in making this decision to hire Rian Johnson as director and writer should be fired. Bring back J.J Abrams and fire Johnson. Don't believe the critics review for this movie\, they are owned and paid by Disney. What a let down!!!!!
